description:
UPX achieves an excellent compression ratio and offers very fast decompression. Your executables suffer no memory overhead or other drawbacks for most of the formats supported, because of in-place decompression.

## Antivirus False Positives

Antivirus software often mistakenly detects UPX as malware. The developers are aware of this issue [1](https://github.com/upx/upx/issues/437) [2](https://github.com/upx/upx/issues/337) and are working with antivirus vendors to prevent false positive detections in future.
summary: Free, portable, extendable, high-performance executable packer for several executable formats
author: Markus Oberhumer, Laszlo Molnar, John Reiser
